fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: DG SANTE and DG AGRI policies affecting the breakfast cereals and oat milling industry.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Member of FoodDrinkEurope, the European food and drink federation
goals__remit:
The European Breakfast Cereal Association represents the breakfast cereal and oat milling industry in the EU. Its members are 9 associations in 8 European countries and 11 companies.  
CEEREAL is proactive in anticipating potential issues of relevance to the sector, and provides input on issues that affect the breakfast cereal and oat milling industries.
